channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 2/6/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Items Per Page Selector in Pagination for Bulk Actions: A dropdown has been added to pagination, allowing you to choose how many items to display per page. Knowledge Base Sort By Title: You can now search KB articles by title. Additionally, click the sort icon to organize articles in ascending order. Quick Customer Calling: A new Call Customer button is available in the upper right corner of the conversation detail window.
